circumstances: While approaching Sells, Arizona, the twin engine airplane was flying at a very low altitude (30 feet above the ground) when it struck a cactus and crashed in flames. The pilot, sole on board, was killed.
probable_cause:
The pilot failed to see and avoid objects or obstructions. The following factors were reported :
- Unwarranted low flying, 
- High obstructions, 
- Hit cactus at 30 feet AGL,
- $ 5,270 cash found at accident site.
